title: Adaptive Scientific Inquiry: Learner-Tailored VR Simulation Projects

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of basic scientific principles and experience with digital device usage
context.additional_context: Environment dynamically adjusting VR simulation tasks based on individual learning style analysis; students develop self-directed learning abilities by solving real-world problems through scientific inquiry processes

learning_goals: Learners can complete VR simulation tasks tailored to their learning styles with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can systematically apply the scientific inquiry stages (hypothesis-experiment-analysis-conclusion) in dynamically adjusted personalized learning paths based on formative assessment results.
Learners can correct and supplement experimental design errors within three attempts by reflecting on personalized feedback suggested by an adaptive system.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
